Detailed Description

This naspace contains utils functions of the vishnu system.

Function Documentation

int vishnu::addLocalAccount ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
const UMS_Data::LocalAccount &  newLocalAccount,
std::string &  sshPublicKey 
) throw (UserException)

Function to add a new local user configuration.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
newLocalAccount is is the object which encapsulates the new local user configuration
sshPublicKey the SSH public key generated by VISHNU for accessing a local account
Returns:
raises an exception on error

newMachine is an object which encapsulates the information of the machine which will be added in VISHNU except the machine id which will be created automatically by VISHNU
Returns:
raises an exception on error

int vishnu::connect ( const std::string &  userId,
const std::string &  password,
UMS_Data::Session &  session,
const UMS_Data::ConnectOptions &  connectOpt = UMS_Data::ConnectOptions() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to open a session.

Parameters:
userId The VISHNU user identifier
password The password of the user
session is an object containing the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
connectOpt To encapsulate the options available for the connect method. It allows the user to choose the way for way for closing the session automatically on TIMEOUT or on DISCONNECT and the possibility for an admin to open a session as she was a specific user
Returns:
raises an exception on error

int vishnu::listHistoryCmd ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
UMS_Data::ListCommands &  listCommands,
const UMS_Data::ListCmdOptions &  options = UMS_Data::ListCmdOptions() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to list the commands.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
listCommands is an object which encapsulates the list of commands
options allows the user to list commands by using several optional criteria: a period, specific session and for admin to list all commands of all VISHNU users or commands from a specific user
Returns:
raises an exception on error
int vishnu::listLocalAccount ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
UMS_Data::ListLocalAccounts &  listLocalAcc,
const UMS_Data::ListLocalAccOptions &  options = UMS_Data::ListLocalAccOptions() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to list the local user configurations.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
listLocalAcc is an object which encapsulates the list of the local user configuations
options allows an admin to list all local configurations of all users or a simple user to list his/her local user configurations on a specific machine
Returns:
raises an exception on error
int vishnu::listMachine ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
UMS_Data::ListMachines &  listMachine,
const UMS_Data::ListMachineOptions &  options = UMS_Data::ListMachineOptions() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to list the machines in which the local user configurations are defined for the given user.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
listMachine is an object which encapsulates the list of the machines
options allows a user to list all VISHNU machines or information about a specific machine and an admin to list machines used by a specific user
Returns:
raises an exception on error
int vishnu::listOptions ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
UMS_Data::ListOptionsValues &  listOptValues,
const UMS_Data::ListOptOptions &  options = UMS_Data::ListOptOptions() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to list the options of the user.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
listOptValues is an object which encapsulates the list of options
options allows to list a specific option or all default options values or for an admin to list options of a specific user
Returns:
raises an exception on error
int vishnu::listSessions ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
UMS_Data::ListSessions &  listSession,
const UMS_Data::ListSessionOptions &  options = UMS_Data::ListSessionOptions() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to list all sessions of the user.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
listSession is an object which encapsulates the list of sessions
options allows the user to list sessions using several optional criteria such as: the state of sessions (actives or inactives, by default, all sessions are listed), a period, a specific session or for admin to list all sessions of all users or sessions of a specific user.
Returns:
raises an exception on error
int vishnu::listUsers ( const std::string &  sessionKey,
UMS_Data::ListUsers &  listUsers,
const std::string &  userIdOption = std::string() 
) throw (UserException)

Function to list VISHNU users.

Parameters:
sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
listUsers is an object which encapsulates the list of users
userIdOption allows an admin to get information about a specific user identified by his/her userId
Returns:
raises an exception on error
int vishnu::reconnect ( const std::string &  userId,
const std::string &  password,
const std::string &  sessionId,
UMS_Data::Session &  session 
) throw (UserException)

Function to return the sessionKey of a session in which the user was disconnected previously without closing it.

Parameters:
userId represents the VISHNU user identifier
password represents the password of the user
sessionId is the identifier of the session defined in the database
session is an object containing the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU and the close policy value
Returns:
raises an exception on error
